name: DieselPunk Rider
description:
DieselPunk Rider explodes onto your screen as an interactive music video experience.

Set in a dystopian future, long after the collapse of the world we recognise, play as a humanoid AI on a harrowing journey to retrieve an experimental energy source which will forever turn the tides in your fight for survival.

Navigate through the desert wasteland, wreaking havoc and leaving destruction in your path; as your journey takes you towards a sinister facility with questionable origins. Will you escape out the other side unscathed, or will the obstacles in your way suddenly slow you down?

Set to music by Matthew Frost and Gus Brady

Caught in the Crosshairs - Matthew Frost

The Experience - Gus Brady
